Lamborghini 0-60 times

It feels like you love hitting the gas pedal to the very bottom and put some interest in Lamborghini vehicles. Curious to know what Lamborghini model has the best 0-60 times? For your convenience our team has collected the acceleration data in one place so that you could check out accurate stats on Lamborghini 0-60 times across models and years.

Browse through the variety of Lamborghini models to discover the brand’s vehicles with the best as well as the poorest 0-60 mph performance. You might also want to trace how 0-60 times of a specific Lamborghini model changed across years or compare between different models of the Lamborghini family.

Why is that so important? It is as simple as that. Although official Lamborghini 0-60 times are almost impossible to reach in real world conditions, at least, it is a great indicator of engine’s power. For only 1% of people are interested in this information, you may rightfully be proud of yourself!

The fastest Lamborghini cars

Lamborghini Huracan 0-60 2.5 - 3.4 sec 1/4 mile 10.4 @ 135 - 11.3 @ 130 mph
Lamborghini Aventador 0-60 2.6 - 3 sec 1/4 mile 10.4 @ 137 - 11 @ 123 mph
Lamborghini Gallardo 0-60 3 - 3.7 sec 1/4 mile 11.2 @ 133 - 12 @ 121 mph
Lamborghini Murcielago 0-60 3.2 - 3.8 sec 1/4 mile 9.3 @ 126 - 11.8 @ 119 mph
Lamborghini Diablo 0-60 4.3 - 4.6 sec 1/4 mile 12.2 @ 0 - 12.6 @ 0 mph
